title: LPI Exam Session 2
abstract: LPI offers discounted certification exams at FOSDEM
description:
As in previous years, the Linux Professional Institute (LPI) will offer discounted certification exams to FOSDEM attendees. LPI offers level 1, level 2 and level 3 certification exams at FOSDEM with an almost 50% discount.

For further information and instructions see https://fosdem.org/certification.
